attributes.title: introduction-vis
attributes.visState:
{"title":"introduction-vis","type":"markdown","aggs":[],"params":{"fontSize":12,"openLinksInNewTab":false,"markdown":"## Observability Playground for Re:invent 

### Introduction

We created this environment to demonstrate Observability features for Re:Invent, which based on the setup of the [When Life Hands You Data, Grab OpenSearch](https://catalog.us-east-1.prod.workshops.aws/workshops/c87214bf-11ea-46b7-82d9-4d934c2a7f53/en-US/introduction) workshop. Users could be able to see a real Observability setup, with Kubernetes-based movie search application, live/continuous logs/trace data ingestion, and OpenSearch Observability and Dashboards.

### Container-level view of reinvent workshop

![Container-Level](https://static.us-east-1.prod.workshops.aws/public/d0329a84-f24f-46b4-9a3f-23ac0b0e5876/static/images/intro/lab-eks-architecture.png)

### Environment information

- OpenSearch Dashboards URL: https://reinvent.playground.opensearch.org/
- Moviegeek application: [Moviegeek application web site](http://k8s-default-ingressm-01116c5b67-1615084315.us-east-1.elb.amazonaws.com/)
- MovieGeek Observability Application: [Observability application_analytics](https://reinvent.playground.opensearch.org/app/observability-dashboards#/application_analytics) → Moviegeek Analytics
- Dashboard - [Application] Moviegeek Overview: [Dashboards](https://reinvent.playground.opensearch.org/app/dashboards) → [Application] Moviegeek Overview.
- Dashboard - [Metricbeat Kubernetes] Overview EKS: [Dashboards](https://reinvent.playground.opensearch.org/app/dashboards) → [Metricbeat Kubernetes] Overview EKS.


### Permission of users

* Anonymous user: read-only to access to OpenSearch and OpenSearch Dashboards
* Logged in Google user: write permission to **Private** tenant, can create index, ingest data via [devtool](https://ml.playground.opensearch.org/app/dev_tools) and create index pattern, no create permission for Plugins.
* Logged in Basic Authentication User: Scoped permission for Private and Global tenant.

### Deployment

OpenSearch and OpenSearch Dashboards were automatically reset daily, it is meaning that user data will be cleaned up daily `04:30 UTC`.

### Storage

OpenSearch cluster was configured size: 50GB for writing, total users storage are 50GB for writing daily."}}
